reviews.review_msg: A very hard marker and not one to truly accept feedback or criticism on his part. He makes things harder than they need to be. Take a course of his if you are willing to pour in plenty of effort.

Those who are whining about test difficulty and not adjusting teaching methods to "100 level students" should get a clue. His classes are not a walk in the park, and they shouldn't be. I've learned a lot through this prof - took 3 courses with him (Ling 100, 220 and 295). If you put in the effort to read and study, you'll do fine.

I've taken LING100 and 220 with him also. He's very easy to understand and he keeps you entertained in class. His exams aren't easy, but he's fair and only tests you on material that's covered in class. A fairly easy marker too. You should have no problem getting a B, B+, A- or A if you do the readings, study the material, and attend class.
